column4: Hi, I'm looking at the wiki page NetworkPrintingFromWinXP and it talks about how to set the printer port in 5.10 and 6.06 but not 7.04. Anyone know where the CUPS port is set?
Brother HL-1850. Already installed locally, just want to print from my XP box
would you like to share it with samba? like a network printer?
That would be okay too, but I figured that cups would allow me to access it via an IP address
honestly i've always done the share with samba, specially if windows clients are involved
either way, try this: System > Administration > Printing
in the connection tab, you should have the "network printer" option
I do, but I have the printer connected to the ubuntu box locally, I want the XP printer to use it as a network printer.
Right now it says Local, should I change it to Netowrk?
yes, try that, then it should be visible on your local network
Looks like all I had to do was enable global sharing under the Global Settings menu option
Thanks very much for your help though
